column4: Hi! How can I mount an USB disk (actually, my former fixed HDD usb-ized) that doesn't seem to get recognized?
are you sure the hardware is working?
does it show up in 'sudo fdisk -l' ?
check cabling and connectors. it's a hardware problem, i'm 99% sure
and check bios for disabled usb-ports
Hey, it worked! I just plugged the disk's 2nd USB connector in and bingo!
but isn't the second one just power?
on the hardware design... obviuosly it's not in your case
